name: ragnarok_tmcard
description:
WARNING : Please wait for the game to load all images/sounds.. Sorry found no compatible preloader plugin.. Thank you for your patience.

This is still beta version.

functioning features in beta :

  • Play Test is enabled All cards Unlocked
  • Gacha Test, Card Shop Test, Card Craft/Break Test
  • Practice Mode - set enemy deck
  • Ranking Mode - random enemy deck, with deck select
  • Adventure Mode - random enemy deck autostart
  • In game Notepad

Audio : Wingless Seraph, Steven Law, Umbertone

Character Graphics, Gravity Yuichiro
